selectYourLanguage:
Hi, I’m your personal assistant to answer questions about investment opportunities with Manateq.

You can ask me simple questions like “How can I invest with Manateq”, or “Do you provide business center?”, or similar questions.

At any time, you can ask to see the Main Menu by simply typing 'Main Menu' - 

السلام عليكم، انا مساعدك الشخصي الآلي ويمكنك ان تسألني عن فرص الاستثمار مع مناطق.

يمكنك طرح أسئلة بسيطة مثل ‘كيف يمكنني الاستثمار مع مناطق’ أو ‘هل توفر مركزا للأعمال’ أو ما شابه.

بإمكانك الرجوع إلى قائمة عرض رئيسية عبر كتابة عبارة ‘اللائحة الرئيسية’.

thanksInquiry:
Thanks, we have recorded your Enquiry and one of our consultants will be in touch with you very soon.

A copy of your enquiry has been forwarded to %s.
maybeinInvestor:
I see you are interested in knowing more about the exciting investment opportunities with Manateq. 

 Would you like to give us some quick details, and we will have one of our investment consultants reach you for a full presentation?
investAnswer:
The Manateq eligibility criteria for approval of companies is as follows:
A Company/Zone Entity must be operating in the sectors designated by Manateq as qualifying for inclusion within the Economic Zone
A Company/Zone Entity must be a manufacturing and/or services company in business within the designated sectors
A Company/Zone Entity cannot be in prohibited businesses as outlined in Qatari Law or Government Policy
A Company/Zone Entity must be a viable sustainable business on the zone
A Company/Zone Entity must generate incremental added value to benefit Qatar
